description:
We get a glimpse of Kaede`s home life and the origins of Blanche. The semi finals for the Kanto Games start and a new upgrade to the Layer is announced. Misaki and Hikaru face off versus Kaede and Blanche.
Source: theTVDB.com

titles.title: A Branca E Pura Buranshe! O Sorriso De Kaede!
Blanche si pure. Le sourire de Kaede.
Blanche, Unschuld in Weiß - Kaedes Lächeln
Junpaku no Blanche - Kaede no Hohoemi
The Pure White Blanche - Kaede`s Smile
純白のブランシェ 楓のほほえみ
